doc.headline: Astorino lawn signs --
doc.post:
Are starting to pop up -- I've had mine stuck in the weeds for a month now --
When I was out & about -- I spotted this
I got mine from rob himself at a gun show
Mine was from our 2014 Firearms Civil Rights Conference - I should have asked him to autograph it -- "Crap - next time when he's the incumbent" --

'Repeal the SAFE Act' signs are on every third lawn around here... and the "Astorino" signs are increasing, too. Now I just hope folks actually get out and vote... it takes a mammoth effort to overpower the NYC free sh!t collective.

Just took a trip to see family in Saratoga this weekend couldn't believe the number of astorino / no safe act signs up everywhere.......though I used to live there and it's a pretty solid repub county, tough to overcome the welfare babies ine the city in statewide elections

At the conference Astorino had a great line -- paraphrasing --
"They say I cant win because of all the democrats in NYC" --
( tapping loudly on the mic )
"HELLO -- I'm not running for mayor of NYC" !
I saw our next Governor of New York on Hannity Friday night for the first time!!

Hes was on Huckabee last night ( who I'd vote for ) ---- something I didn't know --
The fat discussing RINO christie -- is a bigger ass hat than I thought !

Buy your ammo now, because when SAFE II gets jammed through after Commie Cuomo wins, there will be NO buying ammo in the state of NY. Part 2 of the 2nd ammendment violations will require etching on ALL ammo casings sold in NYS. Ammo will become prohibitively expensive in your state or will be nearly unavailable because what manufacturer is going to bother with the additional expense of producing "NY ONLY" bullets? Stock up now before the price per round is more than gold is per ounce...

At the conference Astorino had a great line -- paraphrasing --
"They say I cant win because of all the democrats in NYC" --
( tapping loudly on the mic )
"HELLO -- I'm not running for mayor of NYC" !
~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~. ~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~. ~.~. That's a great line, too bad it didn't work. I'm very disappointed Rob didn't win I've been on the volunteer campaign trail with him since the beginning.. We even went to the same High School.

Buy your ammo now, because when SAFE II gets jammed through after Commie Cuomo wins, there will be NO buying ammo in the state of NY. Part 2 of the 2nd ammendment violations will require etching on ALL ammo casings sold in NYS. Ammo will become prohibitively expensive in your state or will be nearly unavailable because what manufacturer is going to bother with the additional expense of producing "NY ONLY" bullets? Stock up now before the price per round is more than gold is per ounce...
~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~. ~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.
Wait do you know exactly when this will come into effect? I know I heard something about this... can you provide a link? Does anyone on here know the SafeAct well cuz I have some questions...

~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~. ~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.
Wait do you know exactly when this will come into effect? I know I heard something about this... can you provide a link? Does anyone on here know the SafeAct well cuz I have some questions...
What questions do you have? My wife studied it pretty well and might be able to answer your questions.
Biker

The good thing might be --- all the newly elected - "Americans" -- could stifle his socialist plans ---- that reminds me --- there's a few emperor signs left out up by the LIE -- I need fresh targets the next time I get to the range out in Calverton --
I had high hopes of a win for Astorino
I get some satisfaction that he did carry Suffolk --
